name: Old-Timer
description:
"consolation"

In Old-timer a middle-aged man retreats to a quiet town, seeking peace and a new way of living. He decides to quit his bad habits and looks for an old-timer car to put back into shape.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2010-08-14. The photography, writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The character art was done by Glumanda. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Estimated completion time is 20 minutes.

Old-Timer is game Nr. 19 of the Original 22.
